actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 in order to remove certain limitations on cable television systems operating in any State which does not have a commercial television broadcasting station.

summary.text: Removes, under the Communications Act, specific limitations on cable television systems operating in smaller television markets in any State which does not have a commercial television broadcasting station.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 in order to remove certain limitations on cable television systems operating in any State which does not have a commercial television broadcasting station.
